melee_weapons.name: Clockwork Saber
melee_weapons.special: Self-adjusting edge increases precision, gains +1 attack bonus.

melee_weapons.name: Steam-Hammer
melee_weapons.special: Heavy weapon, requires Might 12+. On critical hit, knocks the target prone.

melee_weapons.name: Runeblade
melee_weapons.special: Deals extra +1d4 arcane damage to non-magical foes.

melee_weapons.name: Gadget Gauntlet
melee_weapons.special: Retractable blades and short-range shock pulse (1d4 electric damage, 10-ft range).

melee_weapons.name: Arc-Whip
melee_weapons.special: 10-ft reach, can disable small machines or stun organic targets (save DC 12).

ranged_weapons.name: Repeating Crossbow
ranged_weapons.special: Rapid fire allows up to 3 shots per round with disadvantage on 2nd & 3rd shots.

ranged_weapons.name: Hand-Cranked Arcane Rifle
ranged_weapons.special: Charge-up takes 1 turn; fires an explosive arcane burst in a 15-ft line.

ranged_weapons.name: Grappling Hook Launcher
ranged_weapons.special: Can pull the user or a target (DC 13 Strength save) within 30 ft.

ranged_weapons.name: Tesla Pistol
ranged_weapons.special: Ignores armor; deals double damage to mechanical enemies.

armor.name: Steamplate
armor.special: Grants +2 Might but reduces Reflexes by -2.

armor.name: Clockwork Aegis
armor.special: Can deploy an energy barrier once per long rest, absorbing up to 10 damage.

gadgets_tools.name: Autowinder Gauntlet
gadgets_tools.effect: Wrist-mounted device with extendable tools for quick fixes or escape tricks.
gadgets_tools.uses: Can disable mechanical locks or bypass simple traps (DC 14 check).

gadgets_tools.name: Pocket Dynamo
gadgets_tools.effect: A small hand-cranked generator that overcharges weapons or devices.
gadgets_tools.uses: Grants +1d4 extra damage to electric weapons for 10 minutes.

gadgets_tools.name: Runic Projector
gadgets_tools.effect: Emits temporary glyphs for protection or utility.
gadgets_tools.uses: Can create a 10-ft protective barrier for 1 turn (absorbs up to 10 damage).

gadgets_tools.name: Alchemical Canister
gadgets_tools.effect: A pressurized flask containing healing mist, flammable gas, or paralyzing fumes.
gadgets_tools.uses: Choose one: heal 1d6 HP, create fire hazard (1d6 fire), or stun enemies (DC 12).

gadgets_tools.name: Steam-Jet Boots
gadgets_tools.effect: Short bursts of propulsion allow limited dashing or jumping.
gadgets_tools.uses: Grants a 20-ft burst jump or a free disengage once per short rest.

gadgets_tools.name: Magneto-Wrench
gadgets_tools.effect: A multi-tool that manipulates metal objects at short distances.
gadgets_tools.uses: Can pull metallic objects up to 10 lbs within 30 ft.

consumables.name: Mana-Fused Oil
consumables.effect: Enhances gear performance for a limited time.
consumables.uses: Grants +1 to attack rolls with mechanical weapons for 1 hour.

consumables.name: Restoration Ampoule
consumables.effect: A steampunk-style potion delivered via auto-injection.

consumables.name: Flash Powder Capsule
consumables.effect: Creates a temporary smoke screen for stealth or distraction.
consumables.uses: Obscures vision in a 10-ft radius for 1 turn.

consumables.name: Tesla Charge Cell
consumables.effect: Provides emergency energy for powered devices.
consumables.uses: Restores power to 1 depleted gadget or weapon.

consumables.name: Alchemy Infused Rations
consumables.effect: Field rations that provide minor healing over time.
consumables.uses: Restores 1 HP per minute for 10 minutes.
